description: [Raccoon Stealer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1148) collects the `Locale Name` of the infected device via `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` to determine whether the string `ru` is included, but in analyzed samples no action is taken if present.(Citation: S2W Racoon 2022)

external_references.description: S2W TALON. (2022, June 16). Raccoon Stealer is Back with a New Version. Retrieved August 1, 2024.
